game.name: Enchanted Unicorn Spa
game.description:
Do you love playing with little and cute ponies? Are you a lover of animal games? Join Enchanted Unicorn Spa game and be prepared to go on a lovely adventure with a charming and attractive pony that is waiting for your helping hands! This awesome unicorn has just returned from a magical journey and you see it with some kind of dirt. The pony has a plan to go a new adventure, but it needs a complete makeover before its departure. 
Your objective in this one of the best animals games for girls is to help the pony to be prepared for the adventure. Try to put your fashion skill and style sense to test to make it more charming and beautiful! Get it clean up and make sure to bathe her using the water from a rain cloud! Put your fingers on the mouse and follow the directions to complete the goal successfully in this girls game!
Apply the soap and water to wash it and let it dry when the first task is done! Remember you also have to dress it up with the available outfits once you clean up the unicorn. Go through different combination of eye colors and choose your favorite eye shape to your pony! Work on its every body part, including horn, tail and do not forget to add the fancy accessories to the pony! Select between four unique backgrounds and have fun over again, no download required on atmegame.com!
